attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: It all started when Obama’s time as president was over. The election was here and the people we chose from were Hillary and Trump. There really was no good choice but since they were both bad people chose Trump because he’s a boy. Trump was chosen and we would have NEVER in a million years think this would happen. He almost started a world war, he’s trying to make it illegal for lgbtq to adopt, he’s a HUGE RACIST and not just to blacks but to Mexicans, Hispanics, Muslims and people of color. He’s a RAPIST and get this. So we all know there’s corona virus right? But what you don’t know is that doctors knew about it even before people started getting it. But ofc mr orange Cheeto puff didn’t want to rush things! Donald Trump is a HORRIBLE not only president but person. You can tell that his son, Barren Trump is EMBARRASSED by him. He knows what his father does is wrong and we all do. Does anybody realize we are the exact same thing with different color and backgrounds? Do the white people know what us people of color go through on a daily basis? Why do I get scared when I go downstairs to get water when the lights are off? Why do I get scared to go in the basement by myself? Why do I get scared when I see people walk around my neighborhood? Why can’t I trust people easily? Why am I raised to be careful for my surroundings because of the horrid people like trump? All those questions and there’s STILL MOREE! Donald Trump didn’t do anything good for our country. And even if he did one thing good, he did way more stuff bad! No matter what those 2 good things he probably did, weren’t for people of color to enjoy. It was more privilege for the white racist Karen’s out there! Oh! And if Donald Trump ever sees this some day. I HATE YOU SO MUCH AND I HATE EVERYTHING YOU DO!!! YOU MAKE YOUR OWN FAMILY FEEL EMBARRASSED AND YOU ARE A HORRIBLE PERSON AND PRESIDENT! I AM A BLACK GIRL AND IDC HOW YOUNG I AM I WILL MAKE SOMETHING DIFFERENT IN THIS HORRIBLE WORLD WE LIVE IN!!!!! THE BEAUTIFUL BLACK GIRLS AND BOYS LIKE ME IN THE FUTURE WILL NOT SEE THIS WHEN THEY ARE BORN!! I WILL DO WHATEVER IT TAKES TO TAKE YOU DOWNNN!!!
